title: Ophthalmology Basic Science Online Course: Project-Based Learning Based on the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A customized online course for medical professionals to strengthen foundational ophthalmology competencies. 15 hours of content is studied in-depth over 3–4 months using a PBL approach.

learning_goals: Learners can explore the anatomical structure of the eye via 3D simulation and explain the functions of major tissues.
Learners can analyze refractive error cases and establish treatment plans according to diagnostic protocols.
In ocular disease patient scenarios, learners can integrate clinical symptoms and test results to perform differential diagnosis.
Learners can explain brain-eye interaction mechanisms using a visual pathway model.
Through case studies on ocular trauma, learners can propose emergency response procedures and prevention strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
